issue.title: Collada files do not follow collada specification, id attributes are not unique

message.raw: There were also some inconsistencies with scaling and translations in some of the collada files (pelvis and lower legs) resulting in the models being out of place. This was an issue previously and is described in greater detail here #!/osrf/drcsim/issue/275/scale-incorrect-in-atlasurdf-files. I've attached another zip including these changes.
message.html: There were also some inconsistencies with scaling and translations in some of the collada files (pelvis and lower legs) resulting in the models being out of place. This was an issue previously and is described in greater detail here #!/osrf/drcsim/issue/275/scale-incorrect-in-atlasurdf-files. I've attached another zip including these changes.
